scripts.deploy:frontend: aws amplify start-job --app-id your-amplify-app-id --branch-name main --job-type RELEASE
scripts.deploy:backend: aws elasticbeanstalk create-application-version --application-name slay-backend --version-label v1 --source-bundle S3Bucket="elasticbeanstalk-us-east-1-xxxx",S3Key="slay-backend.zip" && aws elasticbeanstalk update-environment --environment-name slay-backend-env --version-label v1
